channel.title: A command to show PK Points?

item.title: A command to show PK Points?
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Well obviously you must have a Pking point system added, but here the command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mypks")) { sM("You have currently " +pkPoints+ " Pk Points!"); }

To cheack other’s pk points:

if(command.startsWith("chekpoints")) { String name = command.substring(11); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sM(""+playerName+" Watched you're pk points!"); sM("This player has currently "+c.pkPoints+" Pk Points."); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: A command to show PK Points?

item.title: A command to show PK Points?
item.dc:creator: @Thecheeseman11 Thecheeseman11
item.description:
@Thecheeseman11 wrote:

It usually is ::mypks but for some reason this source doesn’t have it. and trust me, theres a pk point system just no way to check it. how do I make it tell them their Pk Points? :]

if (command.startsWith(“mypks”)) {
sM(“You have +Pkpoints+”) }
}

something like that

help?

Read full topic
